description: This file defines protected API endpoints for an authentication system using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for retrieving current user info, general protected access, and admin-only access, all requiring valid Bearer tokens and role checks.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] me(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user))
methods.description: Returns information about the currently authenticated user derived from the Bearer token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] protected_example(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user))
methods.description: Returns basic identity information of the authenticated user for testing protected access.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] protected_admin_example( user: AuthenticatedUser = Depends(require_roles(["admin", "realm-admin"])), )
methods.description: Returns a confirmation response for users with admin roles, demonstrating role-based protection.

ctags.name: me
ctags.pattern: /^async def me(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user)) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: protected_example
ctags.pattern: /^async def protected_example(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user)) -> Dict[str, A/
